channel.title: Hello, I'm Robert from Bugify
channel.description:
Hey, I'm Robert, the guy behind [Bugify][1]. I'm based in Auckland, New Zealand. I started writing Bugify in my spare time while working full-time for another company. It's been live for about a year and a half now, with sales steadily increasing but not quite enough to be full-time yet, so still juggling other things.
[1]: https://bugify.com

item.title: Hello, I'm Robert from Bugify
item.dc:creator: drewm
item.description:
It’s a good one, too. We use it for Perch.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, I'm Robert from Bugify
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Not fair. Every developer wants to write a bug tracker. You’re not supposed to actually finish it!

Read full topic

item.description:
Hey, I’m Robert, the guy behind Bugify. I’m based in Auckland, New Zealand.
I started writing Bugify in my spare time while working full-time for another company. It’s been live for about a year and a half now, with sales steadily increasing but not quite enough to be full-time yet, so still juggling other things.
